name: Ukonien Defense Commitee
startIntroPart1: Welcome, Kömmandant. We are the Ukonien Defense Commitee, created to ensure peace and prosperity for Ukoni and the rest of Nilia. We are a union of states in the Northeast of Ukoni. A parliamentary republic represented by iyr esteemed prime minister Mathilda Radler.
startIntroPart2: Kömmandant, will you bring prosperity for our union and our people? Will you create a spark to enlighten the world again? Will our committee shine through the ages of history like id did many years before? Only you can decide that. Our fate is in your paws, Kömmandant. The Committee will prevail!
attacked: Oh well, I presume you know what you're doing.
defeated: It is over. May the committee's legacy live on, and may Ukoni finally have peace...
introduction: Guten Tag. I am Mathilda Radler, representative of the Ukonien Defense Commitee. What can I do for you?
neutralLetsHeartIt: What can we do for you?
neutralYes: That's a great idea, we accept.
hateHello: Oh it's you again... Make it short.
tradeRequest: Guten Tag, we from the UDC think this trade would be beneficial for both of our nations.
uniques: [+4 Gold, +4 Production, +3 Culture, -1 Faith] [in all cities]

name: Provisional Governament of Hyprecia
startIntroPart1: Greetings General. Welcome to Hyprecia, the jewel of the Apaemoran Desert. Hyprecoa has always been an industrialist nation with a keen eye to technology, especially when it involved mikitary use. So, General, feel free to use all of Hyprecian might to crush our enemies.
startIntroPart2: So, onwards general, make Hyprecia the greastest state of Nilia, even if that means making us the ONLY state in Nilia... Good luck General and Glory to the Dark Star!
declaringWar: You and your nation will pay for that.
attacked: Oh? Are you sure? Well, let me show you what we're really good at.
defeated: You've defeated us... I must congratulate you.
introduction: Greetongs. Please do not step closer. I am Thomas Warren, the Gobernor of all of Hyprecia. What can I do for you?
neutralLetsHeartIt: What can we do for you?
hateHello: Speak. Or you'll meet a bullet.
afterPeace: You're one of the fews that survived our might... Do not test us again.
tradeRequest: I think this could be benefitial for both of us...

name: United Order of Coprein
startIntroPart1: Officer! Welcome to Coprein! We are a nation in the northeast of Eiboris, our strenght comes from rapid industrialization and fire, we bear the biggest land army in all of Nilia.
startIntroPart2: Officer, will you bring the glory of Coprein once again? The people are counting on you. Good luck officer, and long live the revolution!
attacked: You dare to stand in our way? Fine! So be it!
defeated: It is over. Once again Coprein... No, I wasn't strong enough... Imnsorry my people.
introduction: Ni hao, I am the premier Tai from the United Order of Coprein. Welcome! May our nations live in peace.
neutralLetsHeartIt: What can we do for you?
neutralYes: That's a great idea, we accept.
hateHello: Oh it's you again... Make it short.
tradeRequest: Ni hao, great leader! We from Coprein have a request for you, do you accept?
uniques: [+2 Gold, +2 Culture, +1 Faith] per [1] population [in all cities]
